parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Visual Studio Team Services account.

dependencyInputIds.description: The ids of all inputs that the value of this input is dependent on.

description.description: Description of what this input is used for

groupName.description: The group localized name to which this input belongs and can be shown as a header for the container that will include all the inputs in the group.

hasDynamicValueInformation.description: If true, the value information for this input is dynamic and should be fetched when the value of dependency inputs change.

inputMode.description: Mode in which the value of this input should be entered

isConfidential.description: Gets whether this input is confidential, such as for a password or application key

name.description: Localized name which can be shown as a label for the subscription input

properties.description: Custom properties for the input which can be used by the service provider

type.description: Underlying data type for the input value. When this value is specified, InputMode, Validation and Values are optional.

useInDefaultDescription.description: Gets whether this input is included in the default generated action description.

validation.description: Information to use to validate this input's value

valueHint.description: A hint for input value. It can be used in the UI as the input placeholder.

values.description: Information about possible values for this input

InputValidation.description: Describes what values are valid for a subscription input

context.description: Provides binding context for the expression to evaluate

InputValue.description: Information about a single value for an input

data.description: Any other data about this input

displayValue.description: The text to show for the display of this value

value.description: The value to store for this input

InputValues.description: Information about the possible/allowed values for a given subscription input

defaultValue.description: The default value to use for this input

error.description: Errors encountered while computing dynamic values.

isLimitedToPossibleValues.description: Should the value be restricted to one of the values in the PossibleValues (True) or are the values in PossibleValues just a suggestion (False)

isReadOnly.description: Should this input be made read-only

possibleValues.description: Possible values that this input can take

InputValuesError.description: Error information related to a subscription input value.

JobEnvironment.description: Represents the context of variables and vectors for a job request.

systemConnection.description: Gets or sets the endpoint used for communicating back to the calling service.

JobOption.description: Represents an option that may affect the way an agent runs the job.

id.description: Gets the id of the option.

createdOn.description: The date the package was created

downloadUrl.description: A direct link to download the package.

filename.description: The UI uses this to display instructions, i.e. "unzip MyAgent.zip"

hashValue.description: MD5 hash as a base64 string

PropertiesCollection.description: The class represents a property bag as a collection of key-value pairs. Values of all primitive types (any type with a `TypeCode != TypeCode.Object`) except for `DBNull` are accepted. Values of type Byte[], Int32, Double, DateType and String preserve their type, other primitives are retuned as a String. Byte[] expected as base64 encoded string.

count.description: The count of properties in the collection.

keys.description: The set of keys in the collection.

values.description: The set of values in the collection.

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

ServiceEndpoint.description: Represents an endpoint which may be used by an orchestration job.

authorization.description: Gets or sets the authorization data for talking to the endpoint.

createdBy.description: The Gets or sets Identity reference for the user who created the Service endpoint

description.description: Gets or Sets description of endpoint

id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of this endpoint.

name.description: Gets or sets the friendly name of the endpoint.

operationStatus.description: Error message during creation/deletion of endpoint

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the endpoint.

url.description: Gets or sets the url of the endpoint.

assignedRequest.description: Gets the request which is currently assigned to this agent.

authorization.description: Gets or sets the authorization information for this agent.

createdOn.description: Gets the date on which this agent was created.

lastCompletedRequest.description: Gets the last request which was completed by this agent.

maxParallelism.description: Gets or sets the maximum job parallelism allowed on this host.

pendingUpdate.description: Gets the pending update for this agent.

statusChangedOn.description: Gets the date on which the last connectivity status change occurred.

TaskAgentAuthorization.description: Provides data necessary for authorizing the agent using OAuth 2.0 authentication flows.

authorizationUrl.description: Gets or sets the endpoint used to obtain access tokens from the configured token service.

clientId.description: Gets or sets the client identifier for this agent.

publicKey.description: Gets or sets the public key used to verify the identity of this agent.

TaskAgentMessage.description: Provides a contract for receiving messages from the task orchestrator.

body.description: Gets or sets the body of the message. If the <c>IV</c> property is provided the body will need to be decrypted using the <c>TaskAgentSession.EncryptionKey</c> value in addition to the <c>IV</c>.

iV.description: Gets or sets the intialization vector used to encrypt this message.

messageId.description: Gets or sets the message identifier.

messageType.description: Gets or sets the message type, describing the data contract found in <c>TaskAgentMessage.Body</c>.

autoProvision.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not a queue should be automatically provisioned for each project collection or not.

createdBy.description: Gets the identity who created this pool. The creator of the pool is automatically added into the administrators group for the pool on creation.

createdOn.description: Gets the date/time of the pool creation.

maxConcurrentAgentsPercentage.description: Max percentage of agents within a pool running maintenance job at given time

pool.description: Pool reference for the maintenance definition

definitionId.description: The maintenance definition for the maintenance job

errorCount.description: The total error counts during the maintenance job

finishTime.description: Time that the maintenance job was completed

logsDownloadUrl.description: The log download url for the maintenance job

orchestrationId.description: Orchestration/Plan Id for the maintenance job

pool.description: Pool reference for the maintenance job

queueTime.description: Time that the maintenance job was queued

requestedBy.description: The identity that queued the maintenance job

startTime.description: Time that the maintenance job was started

warningCount.description: The total warning counts during the maintenance job

workingDirectoryExpirationInDays.description: time to consider a System.DefaultWorkingDirectory is stale

numberOfHistoryRecordsToKeep.description: Number of records to keep for maintenance job executed with this definition.

daysToBuild.description: Days for a build (flags enum for days of the week)

scheduleJobId.description: The Job Id of the Scheduled job that will queue the pool maintenance job.

timeZoneId.description: Time zone of the build schedule (string representation of the time zone id)

isHosted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not this pool is managed by the service.

poolType.description: Gets or sets the type of the pool

size.description: Gets the current size of the pool.

TaskAgentPublicKey.description: Represents the public key portion of an RSA asymmetric key.

exponent.description: Gets or sets the exponent for the public key.

modulus.description: Gets or sets the modulus for the public key.

enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not this agent should be enabled for job execution.

id.description: Gets the identifier of the agent.

name.description: Gets the name of the agent.

oSDescription.description: Gets the OS of the agent.

status.description: Gets the current connectivity status of the agent.

version.description: Gets the version of the agent.

TaskAgentSession.description: Represents a session for performing message exchanges from an agent.

agent.description: Gets or sets the agent which is the target of the session.

encryptionKey.description: Gets the key used to encrypt message traffic for this session.

ownerName.description: Gets or sets the owner name of this session. Generally this will be the machine of origination.

sessionId.description: Gets the unique identifier for this session.

TaskAgentSessionKey.description: Represents a symmetric key used for message-level encryption for communication sent to an agent.

encrypted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the key value is encrypted. If this value is true, the Value property should be decrypted using the <c>RSA</c> key exchanged with the server during registration.

value.description: Gets or sets the symmetric key value.

currentState.description: The current state of this agent update

reason.description: The reason of this agent update

requestedBy.description: The identity that request the agent update

requestTime.description: Gets the date on which this agent update was requested.

sourceVersion.description: Gets or sets the source agent version of the agent update

targetVersion.description: Gets or sets the target agent version of the agent update

connectionId.description: An ID that identifies a service connection to be used for authenticating endpoint requests.

keySelector.description: An Json based keyselector to filter response returned by fetching the endpoint Url.A Json based keyselector must be prefixed with "jsonpath:". KeySelector can be used to specify the filter to get the keys for the values specified with Selector. The following keyselector defines an Json for extracting nodes named 'ServiceName'. endpoint.KeySelector = "jsonpath://ServiceName";

scope.description: The scope as understood by Connected Services. Essentialy, a project-id for now.

selector.description: An XPath/Json based selector to filter response returned by fetching the endpoint Url. An XPath based selector must be prefixed with the string "xpath:". A Json based selector must be prefixed with "jsonpath:". The following selector defines an XPath for extracting nodes named 'ServiceName'. endpoint.Selector = "xpath://ServiceName";

taskId.description: TaskId that this endpoint belongs to.

definitionType.description: Gets or sets the definition type. Values can be 'task' or 'metaTask'.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of task.

versionSpec.description: Gets or sets the version specification of task.

execTask.description: The utility task to run.  Specifying this means that this task definition is simply a meta task to call another task. This is useful for tasks that call utility tasks like powershell and commandline

platformInstructions.description: If a task is going to run code, then this provides the type/script etc... information by platform. For example, it might look like. net45: { typeName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShellTask", assemblyName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShell.dll" } net20: { typeName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShellTask", assemblyName: "Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Automation.Tasks.PowerShell.dll" } java: { jar: "powershelltask.tasks.automation.teamfoundation.microsoft.com", } node: { script: "powershellhost.js", }

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who created.

createdOn.description: Gets or sets date on which it got created.

deleted.description: Gets or sets as 'true' to indicate as deleted, 'false' otherwise.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who modified.

modifiedOn.description: Gets or sets date on which it got modified.

parentDefinitionId.description: Gets or sets parent task group Id. This is used while creating a draft task group.

author.description: Sets author name of the task group.

category.description: Sets category of the task group.

description.description: Sets description of the task group.

friendlyName.description: Sets friendly name of the task group.

iconUrl.description: Sets url icon of the task group.

inputs.description: Sets input for the task group.

instanceNameFormat.description: Sets display name of the task group.

name.description: Sets name of the task group.

parentDefinitionId.description: Sets parent task group Id. This is used while creating a draft task group.

runsOn.description: Sets RunsOn of the task group. Value can be 'Agent', 'Server' or 'DeploymentGroup'.

tasks.description: Sets tasks for the task group.

version.description: Sets version of the task group.

alwaysRun.description: Gets or sets as 'true' to run the task always, 'false' otherwise.

condition.description: Gets or sets condition for the task.

continueOnError.description: Gets or sets as 'true' to continue on error, 'false' otherwise.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

enabled.description: Gets or sets as task is enabled or not.

inputs.description: Gets or sets dictionary of inputs.

task.description: Gets or sets the reference of the task.

timeoutInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the maximum time, in minutes, that a task is allowed to execute on agent before being cancelled by server. A zero value indicates an infinite timeout.

author.description: Sets author name of the task group.

category.description: Sets category of the task group.

comment.description: Sets comment of the task group.

description.description: Sets description of the task group.

friendlyName.description: Sets friendly name of the task group.

iconUrl.description: Sets url icon of the task group.

id.description: Sets the unique identifier of this field.

inputs.description: Sets input for the task group.

instanceNameFormat.description: Sets display name of the task group.

name.description: Sets name of the task group.

parentDefinitionId.description: Gets or sets parent task group Id. This is used while creating a draft task group.

revision.description: Sets revision of the task group.

runsOn.description: Sets RunsOn of the task group. Value can be 'Agent', 'Server' or 'DeploymentGroup'.

tasks.description: Sets tasks for the task group.

version.description: Sets version of the task group.

message.description: Message explaining how user can correct if validation fails

type.description: Gets the name of the package.

url.description: Gets the url of the package.

version.description: Gets the version of the package.

isValid.description: Tells whether the current input is valid or not

value.description: Value to validate. The conditional expression to validate for the input for "expression" type Eg:eq(variables['Build.SourceBranch'], 'refs/heads/master');eq(value, 'refs/heads/master')

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialized collections as a single JSON object on the wire, to avoid serializing JSON arrays directly to the client, which can be a security hole

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '4.1-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '4.1-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.agentpools: Grants the ability to view tasks, pools, queues, agents, and currently running or recently completed jobs for agents
scopes.vso.agentpools_manage: Grants the ability to manage pools, queues, and agents
scopes.vso.serviceendpoint: Grants the ability to read service endpoints.
scopes.vso.serviceendpoint_manage: Grants the ability to read, query and manage service endpoints.
scopes.vso.serviceendpoint_query: Grants the ability to read and query service endpoints.
scopes.vso.machinegroup_manage: Provides ability to manage deployment group and agent pools
scopes.vso.taskgroups_manage: Grants the ability to read, create and manage taskgroups.
scopes.vso.taskgroups_read: Grants the ability to read task groups
scopes.vso.taskgroups_write: Grants the ability to read and create task groups

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
